article.title: Dix Assigned to G-4, U.S. Army

tags.tag: Office of the U.S. Army Deputy Chief of Staff G-4

article.text: Col. Richard B. Dix, USA, has been nominated for the rank of brigadier general and assigned as director for strategy and integration, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-4, U.S. Army, Washington, D.C.
